DOC.brief_summary: To explore the efficacy of triflusal in the attenuation of insulin resistance in human obesity. Triflusal is a salicylate compound approved in several countries as antithrombotic agent (antiplatelet). The hypothesis is to explore if there is a reduction of obesity-induced insulin resistance by triflusal.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Pilot Study of Triflusal in the Attenuation of Insulin Resistance in Human Obesity
DOC.detailed_description: Double-blind, randomized, cross-over (three periods) with two dose levels of triflusal, placebo-controlled. Interventions: treatment periods Triflusal 600 mg/d, 15 days Triflusal 900 mg/d , 15 days placebo, 15 days Washout period: 30 days
DOC.keyword: insulin resistance in obesity health adults
